mapper.select: SELECT id, name, category, priority, status, deadline, description, progress, created_at, updated_at FROM projects ORDER BY deadline ASC, id ASC
SELECT id, name, category, priority, status, deadline, description, progress, created_at, updated_at FROM projects WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO projects ( name, category, priority, status, deadline, description, progress ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{category}, #{priority}, #{status}, #{deadline}, COALESCE(#{description}, ''), COALESCE(#{progress}, 0) )
mapper.update: UPDATE projects SET name = #{request.name}, category = #{request.category}, priority = #{request.priority}, status = #{request.status}, deadline = #{request.deadline}, description = COALESCE(#{request.description}, ''), progress = COALESCE(#{request.progress}, 0), updated_at = now() WHERE id = #{id}
